reviewText: My class loves Heidi's songs videos!!!
I wanted to use this for kindergarten. The music and videos are too corny.
Very helpful. I sing just a part if a song to remind about behavior.
I love Heidi and all her songs! Great classroom management songs that your kids or class will love!
My students learn great from singing songs and this one is great for some of the classroom problems we deal with everyday.  They really, really like the Tattletale song!
My students LOVE Backpack Boogie. Heidi songs are great learning tools

Wonderful songs. A great way to start the school year with proper behavior skills. I am a first grade teacher and the majority of these songs were essential skills for a happy, comfortable and safe learning environment.
